0000010110000100 0101010010010010 0 -> sum: 0101101000010110, cout: 0
0011000101010011 1100011011011001 1 -> sum: 1111100000101101, cout: 0
0001100000101000 0111001100111011 0 -> sum: 1000101101100011, cout: 0
0111101101000010 1110001111110100 0 -> sum: 0101111100110110, cout: 1
1011001010011110 0010011000000101 1 -> sum: 1101100010100100, cout: 0
0000011101100011 0001001110001100 1 -> sum: 0001101011110000, cout: 0
